title: Blended Case-Based Clinical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and understanding of foundational instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: For pre-service and in-service teachers, emphasizing clinical case analysis and educational design competencies applicable to medical education settings.

learning_goals: Assessing the ability to design blended education based on actual clinical cases
Applying a case-based approach at least 80% when developing medical education scenarios
Achieving at least 85 points in formative assessments utilizing peer feedback and LMS tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
